Summary: UFO in between Indo-US naval exercise - chennai
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on holiday in chennai . On the harbour i saw that Indo-US joint military execrcises were on for the next 10 days . I also saw many UFOs seeing the show from above. They were hovering . This naval exercise was a cover for a anti -alien operation by the CIA . The USS carl vinson the nuclear powered aircraft carrier is taking part in the joint excercise . Join my facebook group called Alien Believers for furthur information .
